alert.note: Alert for San Juan County; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 4:54AM PST until December 23 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation, including freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of around a tenth of inch possible. * WHERE...San Juan County, including Stuart Island, Waldron Island, Orcas Island, San Juan Island, Lopez Island, Blakely Island, and Decatur Island, Lowlands of western Whatcom County, including Point Roberts, Lummi Island, Bellingham, and Sumas and Lowlands of western Skagit County, including Cypress Island, Guemes Island, Anacortes, Mount Vernon, and La Conner. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: San Juan County; Western Skagit County; Western Whatcom County
